#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
int T,i,num,ind,res,j;
vector<int> arr;
cin>>T;
for(i=0;i<T;i++)
{
arr.clear();
cin>>num>>ind;
j=0;
while(num>=ind)
{
arr.push_back(num%ind);
num=num/ind;
j++;
}
arr.push_back(num);
vector<int>::reverse_iterator I;
for(I=arr.rbegin();I!=arr.rend();I++)
cout<<*I;
cout<<"\n";
}
return 0;
}
